# vastdata_folder_read_only (Resource)

Make a Folder Read-Only



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `path` (String) Path of the folder to be read-only.
- `tenant_id` (Number) ID of the tenant to which the folder belongs.
